item.title: Reactive Cognitive API
item.author: prashantkhanal@gmail.com (Prashant Khanal)
item.description: Starting v3.0.1, Watson Developer Cloud Java SDK has introduced Reactive API that allows developers to compose and combine asynchronous congitive operations in a reactive fashion.

item.title: About me
item.author: prashantkhanal@gmail.com (Prashant Khanal)
item.description: Prashant Khanal is a Senior Software Engineer and Developer Advocate at IBM with primary focus on IBM Watson and Cloud Platform. He’s been working on architecting, building and showcasing cognitive solutions using IBM Bluemix and Watson Platform in conjunction with open technologies. Prior to joining IBM, he has worked on multiple startups as well as medium-to-large size company building backend platforms and mobile/web applications.
